dmca.title: DMCA Notice / copyright infringment / greatestjournal.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 

 

________________________________

From: Jason Wilder [mailto:thetikihead@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, May 22, 2007 5:04 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: DMCA Notice / copyright infringment / greatestjournal.com

 

This is my second notice, and this time I added another image that is
violating my copyright that needs to be deleted immediately.

Hello, I am the owner of ishotyourband.com, 
This user has posted my copyrighted images on your server, please remove
it as soon as possible and any other images that are tagged with
ishotyourband.com if there are any, as they are infringing on my
copyright. 

Also This thread in this forum is exploiting my website and allowing
people to share my copyrighted photos, it should be deleted asap also. 

http://www.greatestjournal.com/community/mozillas/111040.html 

This is my DMCA notice 

I would like to inform you that one of 
your clients is using my copyrighted photo without permission and I wish
for them to be removed immediately. 

   
link to the images that violate my copyright: 

http://pics.greatestjournal.com/userpic/34146721/525226 
http://pics.greatestjournal.com/userpic/34146751/525226

Links to where the image was stolen from: 

Http://www.ishotyourband.com 

(in the portraits gallery of "From First to Last") 

They do not have any permission to use any of my photos. Please remove
it from the server. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the infringing web pages is not authorized by my
registered copyright and by the law. I swear, under penalty of perjury,
that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the
copyright owner of an exclusive right that is infringed. 
-Jason Ross Wilder 
Jason Wilder 

Please feel free contact me if you have any questions 

Thanks For Your Time 
cell: 323-972-6873 
Thetikihead@yahoo.com 

16028 Sharewood Dr. 
Tampa Florida, 33618 
USA 

.. ..::Jason Wilder::.. ..


Thanks For Your Time
cell: 323-972-6873
